price: 29. Dia (Fir'aun) berkata, "Sungguh, jika engkau menyembah Tuhan selain aku, pasti aku masukkan engkau ke dalam penjara.”
arabic: قَالَ لَئِنِ ٱتَّخَذۡتَ إِلَٰهًا غَيۡرِي لَأَجۡعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمَسۡجُونِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla la-ini ittakhadhta ilāhan ghayrī la-ajʿalannaka mina al-masjūnīna
